txt.en: Ostasänt can be found in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Ostasänt.
Roving Threat: Mustarka, the Treacherous Wight
Evil stirs in the Northern realm, including Mustarka, who walks the frozen wastes with a murderous gaze, seeking lost treasures.
Mustarka can be found somewhere in Forochel.\n\nYou should defeat Mustarka.

'Something sinister stirs in my land. We Lossoth feel a foul wind blowing from the East.

'The winds brought with them a creature we call Mustarka. This terrifying Wight from Angmar disrupts the balance in my icy land. It searches for something, perhaps a treasure, and kills anything in its path.

'Will you help us to protect this cold North?'

'You say the Wight wore armour from Angmar? This is unsettling. The Lossoth are not prepared to fight what lies to the East. Even our best warriors are no match for the strange creatures from over the mountains that I have heard about. Perhaps having you around will keep the dark winds from blowing too far West.'
